x_highlights.text: MiniMax M2.5: 230B MoE, 80.2% SWE-Bench, $1/hour. The unit economics are insane.
x_highlights.author: GongDao

x_highlights.text: Three frontier open-source models from China in one weekâ€”MiniMax M2.5, Kimi K2.5, GLM-5â€”at 3-20x cheaper than US counterparts.
x_highlights.author: Manny

x_highlights.text: ByteDance's Seedance 2.0 is the most impressive AI video generator I've seen. The physics and consistency are next level.
x_highlights.author: Elon Musk

x_highlights.text: GLM-5 vs Kimi K2.5: Both 1T+ param MoE models from China, 14 days apart. GLM-5 trained on 100K Huawei Ascend chipsâ€”zero NVIDIA.
x_highlights.author: BruceBlue

x_highlights.text: Claude free tier now has file creation, connectors, AND skills. Anthropic is playing the long game while OpenAI puts ads in ChatGPT.
x_highlights.author: AI News Daily

x_highlights.text: Gemini 3 Deep Think just solved 18 previously unsolved research problems across math, physics, and CS. The gap is closing.
x_highlights.author: Asteris AI

x_highlights.text: GitHub Agentic Workflows is the future of CI/CD. Write your automation in Markdown, let AI handle the YAML.
x_highlights.author: GitHub

x_highlights.text: OpenAI accusing DeepSeek of 'distillation' is rich coming from the company that scraped the entire internet without permission.
x_highlights.author: Tech Commentary

x_highlights.text: The Motion Picture Association declaring war on Seedance 2.0 on day one shows how scared Hollywood is of AI video.
x_highlights.author: Film Tech Watch

x_highlights.text: China's AI models this week: MiniMax M2.5 (code), Z.ai GLM-5 (agents), ByteDance Seedance 2.0 (video). All open weights or competitive pricing.
x_highlights.author: AI Industry Watch
